overview: Habol is a photographer has a studio near a crematorium. He is passionate in taking pictures of dead bodies. He works with a senior photographer Kanak in various wedding photoshoots. One day when Kanak leaves the town, Labonya a mysterious housewife comes to Habol. He falls in love with Labonya and starts staying together. When Habol's friends ask about their relationship, he disappears with the mysterious lady from the area
title: Chobiyal
